aws:requesttag/${tagkey}.description: Filters access by a tag key and value pair that is allowed in the request

aws:resourcetag/${tagkey}.description: Filters access by a tag key and value pair of a resource

aws:tagkeys.description: Filters access by a list of tag keys that are allowed in the request

states:httpendpoint.description: Filters access by the endpoint that the HTTP Task state allows in the request

states:httpmethod.description: Filters access by the method that the HTTP Task state allows in the request

states:statemachinequalifier.description: Filters access by the qualifier of a state machine ARN
